content:
Sure, here's a suggested reorganization of the CRM pipeline stages based on the items provided:

1. Lead Capture
2. Lead Qualification
3. Initial Contact
4. Needs Assessment
5. Customized Investment Proposal
6. Investor Follow-up
7. Investor Education and Nurturing
8. Scheduled Investment Call
9. Investor Commitment
10. Investment Closing and Documentation
11. Investor Onboarding
12. Ongoing Investor Relationship Building
13. Investor Referrals
14. Investor Retention
15. Investor Testimonials
16. Investor Feedback and Reviews
17. Investor Reporting and Communication
18. Investor Education and Events
19. Investor Upselling and Cross-Selling
20. Investor Reactivation
